# vertices

**Instance Property**

An array of vertex positions for each point in the plane mesh.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc var vertices: [simd_float3] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each `float3` value in this array represents the position of a vertex in the mesh. The owning plane anchor’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARAnchor/transform] matrix defines the coordinate system for these points.

This array, together with the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneGeometry/triangleIndices-64epx] array, describes a mesh covering the entire surface of the plane. Use this mesh for purposes that involve the filled shape, such as rendering a solid 3D representation of the surface. If, instead, you only need to know the outline of the shape, see the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneGeometry/boundaryVertices-3h98l] property.

## Accessing Mesh Data

- **textureCoordinates**: An array of texture coordinate values for each point in the plane mesh.
- **triangleCount**: The number of triangles described by the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneGeometry/triangleIndices-1azi3] buffer.
- **triangleIndices**: An array of indices describing the triangle mesh formed by the plane geometry’s vertex data.
